person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: NATIONAL FOOTBALL CONFERENCE

Let's think step by step.

1. National Football Conference

This is an organization in American football. It is one of the two conferences in the National Football League (NFL), the other being the American Football Conference (AFC). The NFC was formed in 1970 as part of the merger between the NFL and the American Football League (AFL). The NFC championship game determines which team represents the conference in the Super Bowl, an annual professional American football game that pits the champions of the NFC against those of the AFC to determine the overall champion of the NFL.

There are no explicit "person" entities mentioned in the paragraph, but the National Football Conference itself can be considered an entity or organization.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.
There are no explicit "person" entities mentioned in the paragraph. The National Football Conference is an organization.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| National Football Conference |

The National Football Conference is an organization.
